code: import React from"react";import'./Table_Setting.css';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useState}from"react";import{getSocket}from'./socket';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Table_Setting(){const socket=getSocket();const[bootAmount,setBootAmount]=useState(null);const[initialValue,setInitialValue]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const goToTable=()=>{const value={bootAmount,initialValue};socket.emit("tableSetting",value);navigate('/table');};const handleBoot=e=>{const value=e.target.value;if(/^-?\d*$/.test(value)){setBootAmount(value);}};const handleInitial=e=>{const value=e.target.value;if(/^-?\d*$/.test(value)){setInitialValue(value);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"body_block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting_block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("text",{children:"Create Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"boot_amount",children:["Boot Amount",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"boot_amount",placeholder:"Enter boot amount",onChange:handleBoot})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"initial_stake",children:["Initial Stake",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"max_bet_value",placeholder:"Enter Initial Stake",onChange:handleInitial})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"create_button",id:"margin_cb",onClick:goToTable,children:"Create Table"})]})});}export default Table_Setting;
